mn102:3.1: etaṃ → evaṃ (mr), paraṃ maraṇā → parammaraṇā (s1-3) | maraṇāti (mr), panekesaṃ → panetesaṃ (s1-3, km)
mn102:7.4: saṅkhārehi, viññāṇassa → aññatra viññāṇā (s1-3, km) | aññatra viññāṇassa (pts1) | aññatra viññāṇena (mr)
mn102:11.3: uddhaṃ saraṃ → uddhaṃsarā (bj, pts1) | uddhaṃ parāmasanti (s1-3, km)
